actions.committee: House Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to permit States the reciprocal right to sue in the Superior Court of the District of Columbia to recover taxes due the State.

summary.text: District of Columbia Reciprocal Tax Collection Act - Gives the States the reciprocal right to sue in the Superior Court of the District of Columbia to recover taxes due the State. Provides for the Corporation Counsel of the District of Columbia to sue in State courts to recover taxes due the District.

titles.title: A bill to permit States the reciprocal right to sue in the Superior Court of the District of Columbia to recover taxes due the State.
